function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data scraping from non-official sources","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable data leading to incorrect analysis and decision making","Mitigation":"Verify and cross-reference data from multiple official sources","Technologies":"Data validation tools, web scraping libraries","People":"Data analysts, epidemiologists","Owner":"Data analysis team, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Manual data collection","Impact":"Risk of human error, inconsistency, and bias in data collection","Mitigation":"Automate data collection through official APIs or data sources","Technologies":"API integrations, data scraping tools","People":"Data collectors, researchers","Owner":"Data collection team, researchers"},{"Description":"Reliance on news articles and press releases for data collection","Impact":"Potential for incomplete or biased data, leading to inaccurate analysis","Mitigation":"Cross-reference data with official government reports and databases","Technologies":"Database integration, data validation tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data analysis team, research organizations"}]}
